data.text: Ʋa è zɛ̀nvui makɛ, mazɔlɔɔ gìliʋɛ è ʋa.
Ungo, Màliɠii, è ʋagɛ, ɗa ɗa maavaayɛgi wo fala,
Woilo nà-maanɛɛnɛ wooi ma, ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI!
Nà-kidaaʋili foloi zu, ɗa ɠa nà ɗa wooɠula è ma,
Màliɠii, galagi tanɔpɛ ge la ga è ɠɛʋele,
Ɗa ɠa è ziiti kpein kpɛtɛai, ta ʋa, ti nɔkɔ è ɠɔɠɔwu, Màliɠii,
Mazɔlɔɔ è wɔɔlɔʋɛ, ɗa laavɔɔ vaiti kɛɛzu,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, pelei lɛ ga ze, nii è pɔ ga gè ziɛ la!
Nà è maamusɛzu ga zìimaʋɛ pɛ, Màliɠii, nà-GALAGI!
Ee, GALA, waso nuiti ti wuzeɠea dàalɔɠɔma,
Kɛlɛ, ɗɔun Màliɠii, ɗa ga maawɔinɠa ƓALAGI, nii é zaalai veezu,
Ɠaaʋote nɔ̀un ma, è zaalai la mà!
Ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai ma ʋoogi ta ve bɛ̀,
